itunes:title: Episode 885 - College Football Special With Kirk Herbstreit
title: Episode 885 - College Football Special With Kirk Herbstreit
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: College GameDay host Kirk Herbstreit breaks down where he thinks college football is headed with the SEC adding Texas and OU, the NIL, and the proposed Big Ten - Pac 12 - Big 12 alliance. Herby also explains why he likes Ohio State and Clemson this year,...
itunes:summary:
College GameDay host Kirk Herbstreit breaks down where he thinks college football is headed with the SEC adding Texas and OU, the NIL, and the proposed Big Ten - Pac 12 - Big 12 alliance. Herby also explains why he likes Ohio State and Clemson this year, Oklahoma's defensive improvements, Georgia's chances at a National Championship, and why the Cincinnati Bearcats have a legit shot at the College Football Playoff. 

 

Check out Kirk Herbstreit's new book: "Out of the Pocket: Football, Fatherhood, and College GameDay Saturdays"
